sentences.en: And this I say, lest any man should beguile you with enticing words.
sentences.cn: 4我说这话, 免得有人用花言巧语迷惑你们.

sentences.en: Beijing has a multitude of attractions to beguile the foreign tourist.
sentences.cn: 北京有许多能迷住外国旅游者的景物.

sentences.en: Games are usually used to beguile small children.
He beguile me into sign this contract.
He used his newspapers to beguile the readers into buying shares in his company.
sentences.cn: 他利用他的报纸诱骗读者买他公司的股票。

sentences.en: I was beguiled by the romance and exotic atmosphere of the souks in Marrakech.
sentences.cn: 我被马拉喀什剧场浪漫的异国情调迷住了。

sentences.en: Original light fittings and door fixtures beguile with their period charm and obvious wear and tear.
sentences.cn: 原件灯具和门装置謆他们时期的魅力和明显的磨损.

sentences.en: The teacher used to beguile her pupils with fairy tales.
sentences.cn: 这位教师常常给她的学生讲童话故事,借以吸引他们的兴趣.

sentences.en: When dreams of your presence my slumbers beguile.
sentences.cn: 我在睡梦中被你的幻影蒙骗.

sentences.en: When dreams of your presence slumbers beguile.
